description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
Lot of people wrote to me about summer conditions & water conservation. Spoke about it at length today during #MannKiBaat. 

Was asked a pertinent question on education. Highlighted why we need to think of learning over only schooling, outcome over only outlays. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-april-2016
